name: Hello Sunshine (Titus)
description:
A recent revolution in the world above led to an upheaval in the world below. The Angel of Justice assaulted the dark fortress and let many dwellers out of their prison cells in the abyss of hell. Now they abide in heaven, where their scars and trauma continue to heal. One afternoon, two of these former inmates meet at a cafe in paradise, hoping to light a spark.

Featuring music by Paris Snow.
